meanings.definition: Of or relating to an amphisbaena.
meanings.sent1: The amphisbaenic creature had a long, twisting body.
meanings.sent2: The book described a mysterious, amphisbaenic being in the forest.
meanings.sent3: The amphisbaenic costume at the party was both funny and impressive.
meanings.sent4: Her dance was as amphisbaenic as a serpent's slither.
meanings.sent5: The amphisbaenic shadow on the wall looked like a mythical creature come to life.

meanings.definition: Having the characteristics of an amphisbaena.
meanings.sent1: The old tree had an amphisbaenic shape with its twisted branches.
meanings.sent2: The mysterious stranger had an amphisbaenic gaze that made everyone uneasy.
meanings.sent3: The amphisbaenic cake at the party was a delightful surprise.
meanings.sent4: Her amphisbaenic personality was both intriguing and unpredictable.
meanings.sent5: The amphisbaenic clouds in the sky seemed to dance with the wind.

meanings.definition: Resembling an amphisbaena in form or movement.
meanings.sent1: The river took an amphisbaenic path through the valley.
meanings.sent2: The dancer moved in an amphisbaenic manner, captivating the audience.
meanings.sent3: The amphisbaenic painting on the wall was a unique addition to the gallery.
meanings.sent4: The winding road had an amphisbaenic quality that made it challenging to navigate.
meanings.sent5: The dragon's tail moved in an amphisbaenic fashion, mesmerizing all who watched.
